title: Best AA Reset/Empowered Auto
body: I would like to know what empowered auto has the best scaling and which one you guys think is the best. Other than the obvious {{champion:75}} {{item:3078}} Nasus cane that can stack into infinity, let me know which is your favourite! Thanks!

replies.body:
I would say sivir or Darius, darius because his is a slow on a short cooldown and it applies another stack of his passive, and sivir because it lets her hit multiple targets and possibly crit them all

Edit: And Jax, because if you can get it to proc with your ult passive holy fuck the burst damage is real
Well at level 5 shyv q has 100% total AD scaling, and applies on-hits twice.
